title: Prawn and mussel soup with rice noodles
ingredients: ['100g mussels', '100g rice noodles', '1L water', '1 tablespoon sauerkraut', '50g onion, diced', '1 tomato, diced', '2 tablespoons passata or tomato puree', '2 teaspoons chilli oil', '1 teaspoon sliced garlic', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '60g prawns, peeled and deveined', '1 tablespoon parsley, chopped']
